questions.question: At a party, do you tend to:
options: Interact with many people, including strangers
Interact with a few, familiar faces

questions.question: When making decisions, do you usually rely on:
options: Objective logic and analysis
Personal feelings and values

questions.question: Do you prefer to focus on:
options: The reality of how things are
Possibilities for how things could be

questions.question: Which statement best describes your approach to work?
options: I like to plan everything in advance
I prefer to be spontaneous and flexible

questions.question: How do you recharge your energy?
options: Spending time alone
Being around others

questions.question: When learning new information, do you prefer:
options: Practical details and facts
Abstract theories and ideas

questions.question: In a conflict, do you tend to:
options: Address the issue directly with rational discussion
Seek to understand and accommodate emotions

questions.question: When working on a project, do you:
options: Follow a clear plan and schedule
Go with the flow and adjust as you go

questions.question: How often do you feel overwhelmed?
options: Rarely or never
Often

questions.question: How do you manage unexpected challenges?
options: Plan and adjust quickly
Feel anxious and uncertain

questions.question: When faced with pressure, do you:
options: Remain calm and think clearly
Get stressed and struggle to cope
